response_parsed.title: Refactoring Serverless Handlers Using FastAPI with Python 3.12+
response_parsed.summary: This guide demonstrates the process of refactoring serverless functions to utilize FastAPI for a more efficient, scalable, and maintainable approach in Python 3.12+.
key_points: Adopting FastAPI allows for a more declarative and user-friendly development experience
FastAPI supports asynchronous handling, improving the performance of serverless functions
Using FastAPI with Python 3.12+ enables you to leverage new features such as assignment expressions (walrus operator) and f-strings
The guide showcases best practices for organizing your project structure and handling API requests
